name: Iruxi Glide
summary: You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air.
description:
You glide slowly toward the ground, 5 feet down and up to 25 feet forward through the air. As long as you spend at least 1 action gliding each round and haven't yet reached the ground, you remain in the air at the end of your turn.Traits

Lizardfolk: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
